scenario_description: The hotel contact sends a confusing, one-line reply like 'we will look into this.' The thread shows the client team trying to get clarification on the meaning and next steps.

thread.subject: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
thread.body: Hi team, following up on our Exclusive Holiday Event Package campaign. Are you the right contact for this?

thread.subject: Re: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
Re: Re: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
thread.body: Thank you for your reply.  Could you please clarify what 'look into this' means?  What are the next steps?

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
thread.body: I've forwarded your email to the appropriate department. They will be in touch shortly.

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
thread.body: Great, thank you for the update.  Please let me know if there's anything else we can provide to expedite this process.

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Re: Exclusive Holiday Event Package
thread.body: Hello!  My apologies for the delay.  We're happy to discuss your Holiday Event Package.  Please call me at 555-1212 to discuss options.
